snippet.title: PuPu's Adventure Park Early Access Release Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
PuPu's Adventure Park is an indie simulation game about running a successful theme park with slimes and goblins!

You will get to run this new playground and help the PuPu clan to construct, manage, and grow the park and their clan all the while trying to fight off the evil forces of the Goblin landlords!

The game is now available on PC (Steam) in early access, we hope you enjoy this launch trailer and support the developers behind this game - Plum Tree Tech Studios!

PC store link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1683380/PuPus_Adventure_Park/
